import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Post } from 'src/models/post.model'; import { HomeService } from 'src/services/home.service'; import { IPost } from 'src/components/post/post.class'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit{ posts: any myParams: any editmode: boolean = false; constructor( private fb: FormBuilder, private homeService: HomeService, private route: ActivatedRoute ) { this.posts = this.fb.group({ Id: "", Title: "", Content: "", CreatedAt: "", Author: "", Status: "" }) } async ngOnInit() { this.route.params.subscribe(params => { if(params["id"]==undefined){ return; } this.editmode = true; }); //let posts: IPost = Object.assign({}, this.checkoutForm.value); this.getData(); } public async getData(){ (await this.homeService.getPost()).subscribe(resp => { console.log(resp); this.posts = resp; console.log(this.posts); }); } }
